project_plan.name: Weather Fetching CLI Application in Python
project_plan.description: Build a Python program that fetches the current weather information for a given city using a public API and displays the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Implement functionality to fetch weather data from a public API
Parse the JSON response to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Display the fetched weather information in the terminal
Write tests for the weather fetching functionality to ensure accuracy
Execute tests to verify the correctness of the implementation
